entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 p.m. PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 9:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
Temperature: 5.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind light except southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 near Bowen Island. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 except southeast 40 gusting to 60 near Bowen Island. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
